Class CompareTerm

java.lang.Object
  stringMatcher.CompareTerm

public class CompareTerm
extends java.lang.Object

This algorithm is based on Levenshtein's Algorithm References: http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Algorithm_Implementation/Strings/Levenshtein_distance

Version:
1.0
Author:
Akshay Choche
